attributes.title: This is the worst app ever!!!!!!!!! super vile!!!

attributes.title: Delete this App - THE WORST
attributes.review:

After weeks of it taking to download and then it constantly crashing while I was trying to make a profile I had enough.  This app is as effective as the Administration, a lot of lies, glitches and meltdowns.

attributes.title: Please Stay Away
attributes.review: I downloaded this to keep track of our president because i understand that our media may not always give the people the truth. But this app was not the answer. Instead i was met with bugs and malware that damaged my phone. For that reason I will no longer be supporting the campaign. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!
